ygData.subject: Re: Hi everyone
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually, we have fairly even numbers in each class, with the exception of cleric -- we re running slightly higher on them. Of course, with my main being a
ygData.messageBody:
Actually, we have fairly even numbers in each class, with the
exception of cleric -- we're running slightly higher on them. Of
course, with my main being a bard, I personally think that's a good
thing. :)

--- In EQ_rainbow@egroups.com, "Eric G" <ericdabear@m...> wrote:
> --- In EQ_rainbow@egroups.com, "Todd Morris" <GaybirderSF@c...>
wrote:
>
> YAY YAY YAY!!!
>
> Is there any class the guild needs most?
>
> I've pretty much played them all (a good way to avoid burnout and
> frustration!) and am comfortable with most.
>
> I tend to shy away from Hybrids.. too many restrictions.. I like to
> see progress on the xp bar as well as RP/have a good time.
>
> Hopefully I'll be on this evening (the thrill of joining y'all (I'm
> in Atlanta, I can say it that way) is too much!) :)
>
> Eric
